author: TravisEz13
body:
https://powershell.visualstudio.com/PowerShell/_build/results?buildId=32295&view=ms.vss-test-web.build-test-results-tab&runId=1185382&resultId=100014&paneView=debug

```
At /Users/vsts/agent/2.155.1/work/1/s/test/powershell/Language/Operators/TernaryOperator.Tests.ps1:15 char:37
+ @{ Script = { $true ? 1 : 2 }; ExpectedValue = 1 }
+ ~
Unexpected token '?' in expression or statement.

At /Users/vsts/agent/2.155.1/work/1/s/test/powershell/Language/Operators/TernaryOperator.Tests.ps1:16 char:38
+ @{ Script = { $true? ?1 :2 }; ExpectedValue = 2 }
+ ~~
Unexpected token '?1' in expression or statement.

At /Users/vsts/agent/2.155.1/work/1/s/test/powershell/Language/Operators/TernaryOperator.Tests.ps1:17 char:38
+ @{ Script = { ${true}?1:2 }; ExpectedValue = 1 }
+ ~~~~
Unexpected token '?1:2' in expression or statement.

At /Users/vsts/agent/2.155.1/work/1/s/test/powershell/Language/Operators/TernaryOperator.Tests.ps1:18 char:33
+ @{ Script = { 1 ? 1kb : 0xf }; ExpectedValue = 1kb }
+ ~
Unexpected token '?' in expression or statement.

At /Users/vsts/agent/2.155.1/work/1/s/test/powershell/Language/Operators/TernaryOperator.Tests.ps1:19 char:33
+ @{ Script = { 0 ?1kb:0xf }; ExpectedValue = 15 }
+ ~~~~~~~~
Unexpected token '?1kb:0xf' in expression or statemen
```
title: Ternary Operators tests expect experimental feature to be on
